answers.answer: Sounds normal to me. And fruit is good for u and baby. I have to tell u tho, u will be sick.if them. I had to eat them for my gd diet and after a few weeks the thought of a banana made.me.sick
I had a timewhen I had to have bananas, but I think they r high in pottassium, sothat might be a reasonwhy u craving them... our body is telling us that what it needs!

I was craving them too at the beginning of my pregnancy. I was eating like 4 per day.  Dr told me to limit myself to one per day because I was taking in too much pottassium. Not sure what  he said that causes he just said to not eat too many

I have craved nothing but fruit my entire pregnancy! Juicy apples, strawberries, pineapples, and grapes! Bannanas here and there! Only thing I couldn't have is oranges (especially orange juice...which I love!) because my husband is allergic to them and every time I ate an orange or drank orange juice I gt really really sick!Only concern with eating fruit so much is the natural sugar in them! You have to watch you dont develope diabetes because of the amount you take in!
The only thing about bananas you need to worry about is they can cause you to get constipated if you eat too many! Enjoy them but keep that in mind LOL :)

question: I'm craving bananas pretty badly. I've eaten 3 in the last 12 hours or so. Normal?
title: bananas!?!
